title: Celebrate Dr. Seuss' "Green Eggs and Ham" anniversary with some Houston ham and eggs
text:

The Breakfast Klub : 3711 Travis Photo: Yelp/Dave S. Image 11 of 22 The Eggs Estrellados : potatoes and cured Spanish Iberico ham with over-easy eggs.
BCN Taste & Tradition : 4210 Roseland The Eggs Estrellados : potatoes and cured Spanish Iberico ham with over-easy eggs.
BCN Taste & Tradition : 4210 Roseland Photo: James Nielsen, Houston Chronicle Image 12 of 22 Ham and egg torta : two hard eggs, aoili, cheddar, house ham on a bolillo roll.
Common Bond : 1706 Westheimer Ham and egg torta : two hard eggs, aoili, cheddar, house ham on a bolillo roll.
Common Bond : 1706 Westheimer Photo: Yelp/Denise L. Image 13 of 22 Spaghetti "carbonara" : bacon, ham, a poached egg and spinach shreds.
Hubbell & Hudson Bistro : 4526 Research Forest Drive Spaghetti "carbonara" : bacon, ham, a poached egg and spinach shreds.
Hubbell & Hudson Bistro : 4526 Research Forest Drive Photo: Alison Cook, Chronicle Image 14 of 22 Croque Madame : ham and cheese sandwich with fried egg and béchamel from the brunch menu.

Levure Bakery & Patisserie : 26400 Kuykendahl Photo: Alison Cook, Houston Chronicle Image 15 of 22 Benedict Burger : fried egg, Spanish ham and hollandaise sauce on top.
Vic & Anthony's Steakhouse : 1510 Texas Ave Benedict Burger : fried egg, Spanish ham and hollandaise sauce on top.
Vic & Anthony's Steakhouse : 1510 Texas Ave Photo: Alison Cook, Chronicle Image 16 of 22 "Morning Majic": fried egg and ham po-boy.
BB's Cafe : multiple locations "Morning Majic": fried egg and ham po-boy.
BB's Cafe : multiple locations Photo: James Nielsen, Houston Chronicle Image 17 of 22 Ham & Eggs : Eggs, spam and toast: Yes, at a Chinatown restaurant.
Hong Kong's Cafe : 9108 Bellaire Photo: Yelp/David H. Image 18 of 22 Ham and cheese crepes : held together by eggs, of course.
Melange Creperie : 1701 W. Alabama (inside H-E-B) Ham and cheese crepes : held together by eggs, of course.
Melange Creperie : 1701 W. Alabama (inside H-E-B) Photo: Thomas B. Shea Image 19 of 22 Third Coast Benedict at Downhouse : buttermilk biscuit, tasso ham, poached eggs, tomatillo salsa, cumin hollandaise, side salad (sub duck eggs for $2).
Downhouse : 1801 Yale
Third Coast Benedict at Downhouse : buttermilk biscuit, tasso ham, poached eggs, tomatillo salsa, cumin hollandaise, side salad (sub duck eggs for $2).
Downhouse : 1801 Yale
Photo: Yelp/Anh L. Image 20 of 22 Croissant : Stuffed with ham, cheese, and eggs
Le Donut : 2803 Old Spanish Trail Croissant : Stuffed with ham, cheese, and eggs Le Donut : 2803 Old Spanish Trail Photo: Yelp/Esther A. Image 21 of 22 Green eggs : eggs scrambled with spinach, artichoke hearts, cheese.
Baby Barnaby’s Café : multiple locations Green eggs : eggs scrambled with spinach, artichoke hearts, cheese.
Baby Barnaby’s Café : multiple locations Photo: Yelp/Abbi G. Image 22 of 22 Celebrate Dr. Seuss' "Green Eggs and Ham" anniversary with some Houston ham and eggs 1 / 22 Back to Gallery "Would you eat them on a plate?" Or in a torta? Or as caviar and cracklings?
No matter how you'd like your eggs and ham, Houston has a wide variety that will appeal to any taste buds, moods or budgets.
And that's a good thing, because Dr. Seuss' classic "Green Eggs and Ham" just turned 55 years old, and the best way to celebrate is with a plate of ham and eggs (or some whimsical Bayou City take on the dish).
SEE ALSO: Top 100 revisits yield new favorites - and surprises
First published in 1960, the classic children's book is among the best-selling books in history. It's been republished thousands of times, turned into movies and even re-imagined for TV. According to Publishers Weekly, it's the fourth best-selling English-language children's book of all time.
If you're looking to try Houston's best ham and eggs — green or otherwise — in honor of the tale's birthday, check out these local creative (and classic) takes on the popular breakfast dish.
As the rhyme goes:
Try them, try them!
And you may
Love green eggs and ham today.
See the gallery above for locations and dish descriptions.
